sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
able to do something
ima potrebno spretnost, znanje, sredstva ali priložnost, da tisto stori.

seg.quote: The frog is able to jump three metres.
I wasn't able to do these quizzes.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
able
je pri določenem opravilu dober ali domiseln.

seg.quote: He was an unusually able detective.
